column none -- Column data with no JSON settings
column none --black Column data with no JSON settings but black option
column none --index=1,--headers=1 Column data with no JSON but index and header options
column none --index=1,--headers=1,--scattered=-1 Column data with no JSON but index, header and scattered options
column none --bg=gold,--size=22,--width=1000 Column data with no JSON but bg, width and size options
column none --stroke=5,--width=800 Column data with no JSON but width and stroke options
column none --ymax=50 Column data with no JSON but ymax option
column columns-ticks-index -- Column data with ticks and index
big columns-ticks-index -- Big data in columns with ticks and index
little columns-ticks-index -- Little data in columns with ticks and index
row rows-ticks-index -- Row data with ticks and index
posneg columns-ticks-index -- Positive and negative data with ticks and index
bipolar columns-ticks-index -- Bipolar data in columns
bipolar rows-ticks-index -- Bipolar data in rows
plot plot -- Plot test in columns
plot plot --rows Plot test in rows
shapes shapes -- All shapes
